query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'book_chapters' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%pdf%' OR COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%book%' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4S4NaSTm8gULMAn.ab4bddc10a61 --database fsRnWghWhaoD2r3KXXoRti --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'book_chapters' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%pdf%' OR COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%book%' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE
bookmarkType	enum
pdfStartPage	int
pdfEndPage	int
